card.title: Description
card.content:
In this dialog you can ...
- create a new project. - create a new project and add protein structures from other projects of the same workspace.

steps.annotation: The project name must have 20 characters or fewer. Moreover, the only characters that can be used are 0-9, a-z, A-Z, -, _.
steps.step: `Optional:` Select a protein structure and click on _Add_ to include the protein in the new project.
